input.sentences: a couple decided to be dare devils and go out on a volcano .
they were extremely scared | but they were impressed at themselves for achieving it .
once they got passed the scary part | they were able to see a beautiful area .
they had to breathe in a lot of smoke .
once they got off the volcano | they came across a sculpture .
output.sentences: Last month we decided to visit "Devils Volcano".
Despite being scared out of my mind I couldn't help being extremely impressed.
Once we passed the scary parts we posed for a picture with the beautiful spring.
There was a lot of smoke here, so it was kinda hard to breathe.
On our way out we stopped by a cool sculpture at the foot of the volcano.
